rversions 2.1.2.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

rversions 2.1.22022-08-31

No user visible changes.

rversions 2.1.12021-05-31

No user visible changes.

rversions 2.1.02021-05-24

  • r_release_macos() is now correct again for R 4.1.0.

rversions 2.0.22020-05-25

  • r_release_tarball() now has the correct URL for R 4.x.x.

rversions 2.0.12019-12-03

  • The date columns of all data.frames is now POSIXt, POSIXct, not POSIXlt, so you can convert the data.frames with tibble::as_tibble() directly (#20, @espinielli).

rversions 2.0.02019-05-09

Breaking change

  • r_versions() and all other functions now parse the date, so the date column is a POSIXt, not a character (#13).

rversions 1.1.02019-04-11

  • All function outputs now also have a column with version nickname(s).

  • R versions are now cached within each R session (@richfitz, #6).

rversions 1.0.32016-08-02

  • Use xml2::xml_find_first instead of deprecated xml2::xml_find_one (Thanks to @jimhester)

rversions 1.0.22015-07-13

  • Explicit import from base packages

rversions 1.0.12015-06-06

  • Rewritten using xml2 and curl instead of XML and RCurl (Thanks to @jeroenooms)

rversions 1.0.02015-04-22

First released version.
